data.title: Rafters Nanoswarm For Sands Push
data.description: Use this lineup to isolate the Defenders when taking Sands, as they cannot come out of the smoke unpunished to help their teammates.

data.title: A Site Post Plant Lineup
data.description: Position your crosshair at the top of the building shown in this video, and jump throw for a successful post plant molly.

data.title: B Site Post Plant Nanoswarms For Front / Back B Site Boxes
data.description: Here are two great post plant lineups for the front and back side of the boxes in the spike plant area of B Site.
